            <gmd:abstract>
                <gco:CharacterString>The Waterloo Water Quality Monitoring Data aims to collect and analysis water samples from stormwater facilities in the Waterloo region. With the increasing threat of chloride contamination from excessive road salting reaching surface water to groundwater recharge areas, this assessment allows scientists, engineers, municipalities, and other partners to observe trends, and make informed decisions regarding location prioritization, degree of contaminant, and future planning.</gco:CharacterString>

name: 10-25976-azj8-cy57
notes: The Waterloo Water Quality Monitoring Data aims to collect and analysis water samples from stormwater facilities in the Waterloo region. With the increasing threat of chloride contamination from excessive road salting reaching surface water to groundwater recharge areas, this assessment allows scientists, engineers, municipalities, and other partners to observe trends, and make informed decisions regarding location prioritization, degree of contaminant, and future planning.

notes_translated.en: The Waterloo Water Quality Monitoring Data aims to collect and analysis water samples from stormwater facilities in the Waterloo region. With the increasing threat of chloride contamination from excessive road salting reaching surface water to groundwater recharge areas, this assessment allows scientists, engineers, municipalities, and other partners to observe trends, and make informed decisions regarding location prioritization, degree of contaminant, and future planning.
notes_translated.fr: Les données de surveillance de la qualité de l'eau de Waterloo visent à recueillir et à analyser des échantillons d'eau provenant des installations de traitement des eaux pluviales de la région de Waterloo. Compte tenu de la menace croissante de contamination au chlorure due au sel excessif des routes qui atteint les eaux de surface et les zones de recharge des eaux souterraines, cette évaluation permet aux scientifiques, aux ingénieurs, aux municipalités et à d'autres partenaires d'observer les tendances et de prendre des décisions éclairées concernant la priorisation des emplacements, le degré de contaminant et la planification future.

notes_translation_method.fr: Description text translated using the Amazon translate service / texte traduit à l'aide du service Amazon translate

description_translated.en: DataStream is an open access platform for sharing water and sediment quality data.
description_translated.fr: DataStream est une plateforme en libre accès pour partager des données sur la qualité de l'eau et des sédiments.

title: Waterloo Water Quality Monitoring Data

title_translated.fr: Données de surveillance de la qualité de l'eau de Waterloo

title_translation_method.fr: Title text translated using the Amazon translate service / texte traduit à l'aide du service Amazon translate
